personal.name: Igor Souza
personal.bio: Hey! Just a little about me! I work with data science and python development. I've participated in many projects such as Image Recognition, Bot Builder, Statistical Analysis and API development. All of them aiming to help data to become useful information in the right hands. I also own a bussiness called Soft Medium, which help other companies to develop their own softwares.

history.event: Started my journey in the Development world
history.description: Entered the University to study Applied Mathematics and started to learn programming languages

history.event: Left to Serve a Mission in Africa
history.description: During this time, I've the oportunity to help people and get to know about their culture
Became an english teacher for kids in a big school in my city! A great place to be at that time!
This was a great archivment in my carrer, I've learned a lot about software development and project management

history.event: Got Married to the love of my life
history.description: My spouse and I started this family with the objective to grow together and help one another
Changed my carrer to work with python, when development Machine Learning Models, that was a great step on the right direction

history.event: Changed my course at university to specialize in Software Engineering
history.description: Tho I kept my desire to study Data Science, I loved to create software and manage teams with that in mind

history.event: Moved to Eusébio and Started to work at Dataart
history.description: That year was really challenging because of the many changes I had in life, but I'm happy with the results I've got so far!

portifolio.name: Talk2Web
portifolio.description: Project to facilitate interactions with web pages, youtube videos and online pdfs. I needed a way to have chatgpt but with the knowledge of those documents, so I created this project which works wonderfully!

portifolio.name: Personal Bin
portifolio.description: Some automations that I find usefull on my day by day activities. There are bash scripts and python scripts to do a lot of stuff and even use projects I build myself.

portifolio.name: News API
portifolio.description: This is an api to fetch news from Google News. It allow users to get information about an specific topic. This tools is being used here on my website.

portifolio.name: Nutrition App
portifolio.description: Inspired on my wife, I developed this app to identify types of food in a plate and tell how much of each type are there, a nutritionist will love that! :D

portifolio.name: Pymetaheuristics
portifolio.description: A python package to solve optimization problems using metaheuristics. It is a simple and easy to use developed to help student that are starting in this area.

portifolio.name: Pure Todo
portifolio.description: Pure todo is a project to test the WSGI protocol in python, we usually use a framework to do web development, but how python deals internally with the communication? This is a project to test that and find out!
